channel.title: math.OA updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.OA updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Locally unital $C^*$-algebras do not admit frames
item.description: arXiv:2505.08968v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We study nonunital $C^*$-algebras such that for any element there exists a local unit and prove that in such algebras there is no frames -- a fact previously known only for commutative algebras. Among other, we establish some necessary properties of frames in $C^*$-algebras, and also consider several examples of $C^*$-algebras that are new in this context.
item.dc:creator: Denis Fufaev

item.title: The Haagerup property in terms of invariant and mixing states
item.description: arXiv:2505.09237v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: The aim of the article is to provide a characterization of the Haagerup property for locally compact, second countable groups in terms of approximations of some non-ergodic invariant states by mixing ones for actions on unital $C^*$-algebras.
item.dc:creator: Paul Jolissaint

item.title: A Cantor spectrum diagonal in O_2
item.description: arXiv:2409.03511v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: We prove the existence of a C*-diagonal in the Cuntz algebra O_2 with spectrum homeomorphic to the Cantor space.
item.dc:creator: Philipp Sibbel, Wilhelm Winter

item.title: Non Kazhdan's groups and a new approximation property for tracial von Neumann algebras
item.description: arXiv:2410.06579v5 Announce Type: replace Abstract: We define a new approximation property for tracial von Neumann algebras, called \textit{weakly mixing approximation property}, and we prove that it is equivalent to the negation of Kazhdan's Property (T) for discrete groups.
item.dc:creator: Paul Jolissaint
